snippet: Ko, 17, fell in the inaugural Coates Golf Championship by a stroke but still became the youngest player to earn the No. 1 ranking, topping Tiger Woods’s record by almost four years.
abstract: Lydia Ko earns No 1 ranking, despite loss to Na Yeon Choi in inaugural Coats Golf Championship.
lead_paragraph: Ko, 17, fell in the inaugural Coates Golf Championship by a stroke but still became the youngest player to earn the No. 1 ranking, topping Tiger Woods’s record by almost four years.

headline.main: Despite Loss, Lydia Ko Takes No. 1 Ranking
headline.print_headline: Ko Takes No. 1 Ranking Despite Loss
